text: The Chinese ambassador in Doha is the official representative of the Government in Beijing to the Government of the Qatar. ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément/Diplomatic accreditation !| Ambassador !| Chinese language :zh:中国驻卡塔尔大使列表 !| Observations !| Premier of the People's Republic of China !| List of Prime Ministers of Qatar !| Term end |- | | | | The governments in Doha and Beijing established diplomatic relations. |Li Peng |Khalifa bin Hamad Al Thani | |- | |Hu Changlin |:zh:胡昌林 | |Li Peng |Khalifa bin Hamad Al Thani | |- | |Tan Shengzheng |谭声琤 | |Li Peng |Khalifa bin Hamad Al Thani | |- | |Gao Wenxian |高文献 | |Li Peng |Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani | |- | |Zhou Xiuhua (PRC diplomat) |:zh:周秀华 | |Zhu Rongji |Abdullah bin Khalifa Al Thani | |- | |Zhao Huimin |:zh:赵会民 |Zhao Huimin |Zhu Rongji |Abdullah bin Khalifa Al Thani | |- | |Li Jianying (PRC diplomat) |李建英 | |Wen Jiabao |Abdullah bin Khalifa Al Thani | |- | |Yue Xiaoyong |:zh:岳晓勇 | |Wen Jiabao |Hamad bin Jassim bin Jaber Al Thani | |- | |Zhang Zhiliang (PRC diplomat) |张志良 | |Wen Jiabao |Hamad bin Jassim bin Jaber Al Thani | |- | |Gao Youzhen |高有祯 | |Wen Jiabao |Hamad bin Jassim bin Jaber Al Thani | |- | |Li Chen (diplomat) |李琛 | |Li Keqiang |Abdullah bin Nasser bin Khalifa Al Thani | |} Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, [Chinese Ambassadors to Qatar, , 驻卡塔尔国历任大使, == References == Qatar China
title: List of ambassadors of China to Qatar
